appsAndroid.playStoreKey: path to google play api key: https://developers.google.com/android-publisher

appsIos.appStoreKeyId: Key ID column after generate app store connect API: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/appstoreserverapi/creating_api_keys_to_use_with_the_app_store_server_api
appsIos.appStoreKey: private key generate in app store connect
appsIos.appStoreIssuerId: Issuer id generate in app store connect
